Get an input matrix for diff ASE heatmap

Source: R/splicewiz_wrappers.R
dot-get_aes_heatmap_data.Rd

Get an input matrix for diff ASE heatmap

Usage

.get_aes_heatmap_data(
  se,
  event_names,
  samples,
  replicates = TRUE,
  method = "PSI",
  column_condition = "condition"
)

Arguments

se

an object of class NxtSE.

event_names

a character vector denoting valid ASE names to plot in heatmap.

samples

a character vector denoting valid sample names to plot in the heatmap.

replicates

logical, default TRUE, denoting whether to show sample replicates or not.

method

a character string denoting a method for data value. Can be one of the "PSI", "logit" or "Z-Score"

column_condtion

a name of column in se storing condition. Deafault: "condition"

Value

a data matrix

Examples

se <- SpliceWiz::SpliceWiz_example_NxtSE(novelSplicing = TRUE)
SpliceWiz::colData(se)$treatment <- rep(c("A", "B"), each = 3)
SpliceWiz::colData(se)$replicate <- rep(c("P","Q","R"), 2)
res_edgeR <- SpliceWiz::ASE_edgeR(se, "treatment", "A", "B", useQL = FALSE)
#> Feb 27 15:01:18 Performing edgeR contrast for included / excluded counts separately
#> Feb 27 15:01:19 Performing edgeR contrast for included / excluded counts together
event_names = get_edger_diff_ase_event_names(res_edgeR,   padj_cutoff = 1)
.get_aes_heatmap_data(se, event_names , samples = c("A", "B"), column_condition ="treatment")
